tree_bot_mobile_activated.label: Display the CarbonBot on mobile sites
tree_bot_mobile_activated.help: Allows you to define whether or not you want to display the CarbonBot on mobile sites.

tree_details_url.label: Your commitments page
tree_details_url.help: Optional: if filled in, a 'Find out more' link will be displayed in the CarbonBot and will allow your customers to access a page of your choice (for example to develop your commitments).
